member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.AWA.WebShortcutBar.Config(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures and loads the shortcut bar. Uses the shortcuts for the user specified within the UserCredentials inside the Application parameter. Set the FolderList property first if the shortcut bar will be connected to the folder list

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.AWA.WebShortcutBar.Config(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures and loads the shortcut bar. Loads shortcuts for the specified User in the AptifyUserID property. Set the FolderList property first if the shortcut bar will be connected to the folder list
